Ivashina, Victoria, and David S. Scharfstein. 2009. Bank Lending during the Financial Crisis of 2008. Journal of Financial Economics, forthcoming.

Shleifer, Andrei, and Robert W. Vishny. 1997. The Limits of Arbitrage. Journal of Finance, 52(1): 35-55.
Shleifer, Andrei, and Robert W. Vishny. 2009. Unstable Banking. Journal of Financial Economics, forthcoming.
